actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that parents of permanent residents be eligible to file for the second preference category.

summary.text: Provides that parents of permanent residents be elibible to file for the second preference category, under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that parents of permanent residents be eligible to file for the second preference category.
